title: SharePoint: Updated site creation experience
description:
With this update, you will choose a site
template based on your scenario to get started creating your site. When
choosing a template you can see its capabilities, and even see a preview. This
change will help site owners through the process by simplifying and providing
additional guidance while creating the site. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.
